tag_list: social-media, seo, sem, pay-per-click, web-2-0, web-3-0, online-pr, online-marketing, web-analytics, email-marketing, usability
overview:
Highly skilled online marketing professional with expertise in Social Media, Video Advertising and Search Engine Marketing.

Cofounder of VideoGoGo video+social+advertising. Previously the Director of Social Media for Booyah Online Advertising where I led the social media division and developed social media strategy for clients. I previously worked for Jeppesen (a Boeing company) where I led social media for JeppDirect, the company’s ecommerce site. I’ve also served as Director of Marketing for a social network.

Experienced in managing Million dollar-plus interactive marketing campaigns that maximize ROI and increase sales/lead generation. Have put in place sophisticated marketing reporting and analytics tracking programs (Omniture & Google Analytics).

Qualifications include Social Media, Video Production, Video Advertising, SEM, PPC, SEO, Pay-per-click, web analytics, email marketing, online brand reputation management and marketing budget management. MBA in marketing from the University of Denver - Daniels College of Business and Bachelor of Arts from the Unviersity of Wisconsin-Madison in Communications - School of Journalism.

Connect with me on LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/jamieduklas
